channel.title: [Release 317 format] 729 item.cfg (ALL CORRECT BONUS) [Release 317 format]
channel.description:
I've decided to release the 729 item.cfg. All item bonuses are from RuneWiki. This contains all items from 0 - 24905. As I've said in the title all item bonuses has been added correctly to all items which has a bonus added to it.
NOTE: ALL BONUSES ARE IN THE 317 FORMAT! SO THERE ISN'T ANY OF THE EXTRA BONUSES WHICH JAGEX HAS UPDATED!
Example inside the CFG (317 format):
[code] item = 21462 Battle-mage_helm Headgear_for_a_warrior_wizard. 400000 400000 400000 0 0 0 8 -17 65 70 63 12 -8 3 0 [/code]
Download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?rbpcu9oudwyj8zm]Mediafire - Download item.cfg[/url] [B]729 item.cfg[/B]
NOTE: IF ANYONE TRIES TO SELL THIS FOR RSGP I DON'T CARE! PLEASE DON'T PM ME AND TELL ME ITS BEING SOLD!
[B]Optional downloads:[/B]
721 item prices: (NOTE: ALL VALUES ARE RUNESCAPE GRAND-EXCHANGE PRICES) (prices.txt) [url=http://uppit.com/c8syasc694cj/prices.txt]Download prices.txt @ UppIT[/url]

item.description:
@Vitems wrote:

I’ve decided to release the 729 item.cfg. All item bonuses are from RuneWiki. This contains all items from 0 - 24905. As I’ve said in the title all item bonuses has been added correctly to all items which has a bonus added to it.

NOTE: ALL BONUSES ARE IN THE 317 FORMAT! SO THERE ISN’T ANY OF THE EXTRA BONUSES WHICH JAGEX HAS UPDATED!

Example inside the CFG (317 format):

item = 21462	Battle-mage_helm	Headgear_for_a_warrior_wizard.	400000	400000	400000	0	0	0	8	-17	65	70	63	12	-8	3	0

Download link:
Mediafire - Download item.cfg 729 item.cfg

NOTE: IF ANYONE TRIES TO SELL THIS FOR RSGP I DON’T CARE! PLEASE DON’T PM ME AND TELL ME ITS BEING SOLD!
